description: This file declares the LocalStore class, which implements the ILocalStore interface for managing local data storage using SQLite. It specifies the class methods, internal members, and includes related headers.

classes.name: LocalStore
classes.description: Implements the ILocalStore interface to provide local database storage functionality using SQLite. Manages database connection and data operations such as create, add, remove, and retrieve entries.

methods.name: Open
methods.description: Opens or creates a database at the specified path.

methods.name: CreateTable
methods.description: Creates a new table in the database.

methods.name: SetLimit
methods.description: Sets a size limit for a specific table.

methods.name: GetEntriesCount
methods.description: Retrieves the count of entries in a table within a specified range.

methods.name: GetEntries
methods.description: Retrieves a list of entries from a table starting at a given offset.

methods.name: RemoveEntries
methods.description: Removes entries from a table within a specified range.

methods.name: AddEntry
methods.description: Adds a new entry to a table.

methods.name: buildGetEventsQuery
methods.description: Constructs an SQL query for retrieving events from a table based on start position and count.
